title: Bonus Episode: Sequences with consequences
itunes:title: Bonus Episode: Sequences with consequences
itunes:subtitle: In this special edition, produced by our friends from the Science Focus podcast, Dr Robert Elliott Smith examines the dark history of algorithms and considers how they affect all of our lives today.
description:
In this special edition, produced by our friends from the Science Focus podcast, Dr Robert Elliott Smith examines the dark history of algorithms and considers how they affect all of our lives today.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
